column2: Alpha Black to Papa Bear. Objective One cleared and secured. Over.
Papa Bear, this is Alpha Black. We're at the second objective. AAA threat neutralized. Over.
Team Alpha to Papa Bear. We're at the extraction point. Over.
Roger that, Alpha. Papa Bear out.
Papa Bear to Alpha. Understood. Good work. Out.
Acknowledged, Alpha Black. Extract is en route. Mission accomplished. Papa Bear out.
Edwards, SEAL, at a NW Dunsborg beach.
